column2:
"Nice work out there. You've passed the
first boot camp for your new weapon."
"This is still only the beginning. It's like the entrance, so don't get too cocky."

"Well, I'll see you at the next boot camp.
Until then..."

"ご苦労様。
まずは最初の特訓をクリアと
いったところね。"

"まだまだ序の口。
入り口のようなものだから
調子に乗らないように。"

"それじゃ、また次の
特訓で会いましょう。"
